__e: She was 14... walking home from school, and he grabbed her off the street, drove away with her.
Tony and I came home from school one day... and we were all that was left of our family.
Nobody stopped to realize that this man had just been in a war zone for nine months, a year, and nobody talked about that.
He told me that he was back in town, that he'd moved back, and...

Yeah, but he was talking about how his--his past came back, and, you know, that he wasn't always a nice guy, which-- Yeah, but for someone who tortures people with pliers, he's been very nice these last four years.
If my son should come back and your father isn't here... it might be better if you didn't let him in.
Why were we scared when he was at home?
I SAW THAT HE'S COMING BACK TO HIMSELF,
Why are you hitting me? I thought you were dead, coming back to life!
It only lasted a few seconds, but it was like... it was like he died and then he came back to me.
We were sort of going on the road like 3 or 4 days... coming back into NY, going to the studio for like 2 to 3 days... which isn't very good, I don't think.
Why are you hitting me? I thought you were dead, coming back to life!
I told her I ran into you and she couldn't believe it either.
And then who would believe I did it because I didn't like you?
That woman, she gave us each, you know, a little money and-and said she was willing to look the other way as long as we never came back again.
